text: I I talk especially for those in the patreon we spent some time looking through these different sectors to find what sectors are performing well and expanding and then looking for leaders within those sectors because right now there is so much money to be made as long as you're pragmatic in your approach you're careful with your risk long equities right now is such a tough trade to beat because if we look at something as simple as just forward e- minis I mean they're at nose beds they cracked above six and they're hanging out up there so I look at this as two different trading Windows there's the near-term follow-through of all this stuff about 90 days and then beyond that we start getting into more thematic positioning based on when we get a little more clarity around the policies so hope that was helpful if there's any questions throw them in the comments below and then if there anything you're specifically looking at I would love to hear about that as well be an outlier I will see you all later
